text: Umu: Hi everyone, my name is Umu and I'm ReacttotheK's channel creator.
and in this very special video, I had the honor of interviewing a very unique K-Pop girl group called Dreamcatcher.

Jiu: 2, 3
Everyone: dream of me! Hello, we are Dreamcatcher. Hi!
*Dreamcatcher's PIRI plays*
Umu: This interview was able to happen all thanks to My Music Taste
I live in the US, Dreamcatcher's in Korea
and so what happened was
I sent My Music Taste my questions, they translated and gave them to Dreamcatcher.
and Dreamcatcher answered via video annnnd...here we are!
If you don't know who My Music Taste is, they are actually a concert-making platform.
Thanks to fans all over the world visiting My Music Taste's website and putting in where they want their favorite K-Pop group to go,
Dreamcatcher and a bunch of other groups are able to tour all around the world.
So that was just a lil blurb about My Music Taste, so now let's just jump into the interview.
Umu: Dreamcatcher, what is your favorite part of the comeback process?
Is it having new hair? New (clothing) style? Having a new song to sing, having new choreo? What is it?
Yoohyeon: I personally enjoy getting my hair dyed. / Everyone else: Yeah I agree
Yoohyeon: New me!
Siyeon: YEAH!
Siyeon: I enjoy getting a new song and recording. I want (our fans) to hear as soon as possible.

Sua: While the process is fun, I enjoy showing result.
Yoohyeon: I agree
Gahyeon: I think I feel great when I perform at the stage like a showcase. Especially when I show the stage to our fans for the first time.
Umu: My next question is: what was your favorite album photoshoot to do?

Gahyeon: For me, when we did “YOU AND I?”
Yooheyon: OH!
We took photos of each other which was a lot of fun.
Yoohyeon: that's right
Jiu: For me, “Chase Me.” I cannot forget this song’s music video set...
because it was so pretty.
Sua: that's right

Handong: For me, “날아올라(Fly high).” 
Jiu: right, right!

Handong: Everything was really fresh!
Siyeon: pretty~
Umu: from one of your past title tracks, is there a song sung, rapped or choreographed part that you're really proud of?
something that took a really long time to master, so you're really happy that you overcame the challenge?
Dami: In “YOU AND I,” I spin a rod for my part
everyone: ahh
and I was proud of myself when I didn’t drop it and make any mistakes as we kept performing.
everyone: ohh <3
Sua: cute, cute!
Gahyeon: Her skill got so much better, too.
Sua: For me, when we did “PIRI,”
I heard a lot of (live) MR removed videos.

Siyeon: *singing the chorus* Down, down, down!
Sua: I really loved that part.
Yoohyeon: She practiced really hard as well.

Gahyeon: she practiced every morning even when her voice wasn’t 100%.
Yoohyeon: that's right
Umu: What are some pre-performance rituals that you do? Do you close your eyes, listen to the music and imagine yourself performing?
Or do you go on vocal rest?
Jiu: I do stretching.
I get too excited when I perform at the stage. Then I use my neck a lot.
Dami: sometimes excessively, right?
One time on stage, my neck movement caused me to suffer pain for some time. Hence I do stretching before the performance.
Yoohyeon: I rest as much as possible.
Since I have to perform and bring up the tension during the performance, I just sit and do nothing.

Sua: And I believe this is for every member that we need to eat.
Yoohyeon & Jiu: yep
Food is the source of power.

Siyeon: a meal and sleep!
Yoohyeon: Yep!
Umu: What techniques do you have for battling pre-performance nerves?
For me, I'm a French horn player, so I eat a lot of bananas for the potassium
and drink a LOT of water so my mouth doesn't get dry and so I don't shake while I perform.

Siyeon: banana? 
Handong: eating a banana?
bANANA? Is banana helpful?
Gahyeon: Maybe it's her unique way of calming her nerves.

Siyeon: Oh I want to try that.
Yoohyeon: Me, too. Me, too.
Jiu: I just play with members before the stage. We talk a lot too.

Siyeon: Like “Fighting!(Cheering up)”
 Everyone else: Yeah! Fighting!! Fighting! Let's Fight!

Gahyeon: you know we change it every time, right?
Yoohyeon: that's true.
Gahyeon: When everyone is more conscious, we do “V”, otherwise just hands.

Siyeon: I think doing this kind of cheer-up before the performance helps our spirit the best.
Everyone else: yes I agree.
Umu: what is the hardest part about performing and what do all the members do to try and overcome that challenge?
Gahyeon: The hard part is….
Siyeon: SWEAT
Everyone: aHHHHHHH
Siyeon: I generally sweat a lot and sometimes get dehydrated. Sometimes it's hard to center myself.
However, I forget about this whenever I think about showing a great performance to our fans.
Jiu: Yes I have hard time whenever sweat goes into my eyes.
But then I wink.
Yoohyeon: ah that’s how you get so many pretty photos!
Yoohyeon: Ah! It’s physically challenging for me. To overcome, we practice together a lot before the concert to build the strength. I think that’s how I solve it.
Gahyeon: It's physically difficult for me as well. But then I plug off one earphone to hear chants from our fans.

Everyone else: Right
Siyeon: That’s so cool!
Gahyeon: Ah when did I do that???
Umu: You guys are so expressive when performing live.
Do you have an acting coach or do you practice a lot in front of a mirror?
Jiu: When we did “Chase Me,” each member danced in front of others.

Yoohyeon: that's right. and provided feedback!
Jiu: yes.

That’s what we did. And each stood in front of a mirror and practiced the expression.
Everyone else: And gesture!
Sua: Now it’s so natural for us since we practiced hard from the beginning.
Jiu: our choreographer also told us to create our own gesture for each part, which helped, too.
Gahyeon: Oh my God!

Gahyeon: our expressions are all from our makeup, and we are sorry.
(Yoohyeon: Haha, she says it's from the makeup)
MMT: Now, we'll have you react to the next scenarios with your facial expressions
Siyeon: Just look at my expression please!
Yoohyeon: this is too much.

Jiu: Should we go this way?
Zigzag!
Sua: Show them
Zigzag!
Sua: Ahhh that’s how we do it? You just give Siyeon a prompt and we guess her expression?
MC: you can start acting when I give you a prompt.
Yoohyeon: Here I spilled!

Jiu: Ah ok
Siyeon: Then let’s pretend our members are spilling.
Dami: Unnie, you should act only using facial expression.

Siyeon: I'm going to react to the members spilling
("Start")

Yoohyeon: Action!
Siyeon: Action
Siyeon: *sarcastic* It’s okay
Yoohyeon: Wow! I was scared for a moment.
Siyeon: We are one!

Siyeon: Oh that’s the worst!
Dami: Yeah, that's the worst

Yoohyeon: Okay. Are you ready?
Handong: Yes
Yoohyeon: Action!
*Gahyeon becomes an edm drop*
Yoohyeon: Right right / Gahyeon: She really does this when she hears noise from the ceiling. Using her foot… Baaaam!
Siyeon: We are quite.... tough.
Yoohyeon: when it’s too early or late night.
*chaos*

Yoohyeon: Guys! Say action for me! 
Everyone else: Action!
*remove headphones now*

Sua: WHAT WAS THAT????
Gahyeon: Excuse me miss??
Excuse me?
Dami: that was good!
Yoohyeon: That's cold
Yoohyeon: You don't behave like this?
Jiu: You look like a puppy
Jiu: That was good

Sua: That was hilarious. 
Everyone else: It's Sua's turn. I'm looking forward to it.
Everyone: *gasps in both excitement and fear*

Sua: Hold on!
Everyone else: plug your ears!
Jiu: If you have earphones, take those out!

Gahyeon:Because there is high pitched sound, we are plugging our ears
Jiu: take them out now!
Siyeon: Action!

Sua: Who’s going to be a clown?
Everyone else: Gahyeon!
Siyeon: 1, 2, 3...action! *prepares*
Sua: I’m so scared..
nice try Gahyeon
Yoohyeon: It was too weak. Try again!

Gahyeon: I think the crown should be in front since I’m on the side.
Everyone else: Action!

Yoohyeon: *is clown*
Sua: *gets actually scared*
Yoohyeon: *laughs in pain*
Yoohyeon: I couldn’t guard my ears in time...
Gahyeon: ah we should had recorded Yoohyeon’s facial expression too. It was so cute!
Sua: her doing this scared me even more *ahhhh*
You guys are all known for being very serious and fierce performers on stage.
But has there been a moment when something happened and you couldn't control your smile/laughter?
Everyone: there were many.
*idk what just happened*

Siyeon: During “You and I,” I heard a ghost sound during a broadcast performance.
Sua: Eh?

Gahyeon: Ah… They were making a high pitch cheer to support us. 
Handong: ahhhh!
That was really funny to me since I could hear it from the headphones. Hence, it was funny. But I laughed.
I don’t think it was on camera, but I laughed while I was not on the camera.
Gahyeon: We laughed a lot when we were not on camera.

Siyeon: making an eye-contact with our fans during the performance
Yoohyeon: Right right.

Gahyeon: Since we memorized the camera movement.
Siyeon: That’s right. Our brain has all.
Dami: For me, when we turned and sat [for Fly High choreo] during the event performance,

Jiu had to... 
Jiu: Ah, that time! 
Gahyeon: that’s so hilarious.
untangle a ribbon for Yoohyeon as she sat and sang during her part.

Gahyeon: Ah, really?
Sua: Right, right, right
Yoohyeon: That was really funny
Umu: thank you guys so much! It was an honor to interview such crazy, sweet, funny,
fierce, hardworking performers.
USA Insomnias and I are looking forward to the day we get to meet you and we wish you the best of luck on your Malaysia and Australia tours!
Jiu: We always want to let them know; Thank you for much for bringing us to a country.
We are so thankful. We won’t forget your gratitude, and always perform cool, earnest, and fun performance.
Fighting!
I love you InSomnia~ LOL
Yoohyeon: wait for us!
